item.title: How can i add, and remove thieving stalls?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

kickyamom50:

how to i add and remove thieving stalls, and also change there loot?

to add an thieving stall go to:
notes>objects ID. if u got the id go to ur client.java and search for NewObjects then u will see underneath that some codes like makeGlobalObject(…) add this
makeGlobalObject(2330, 3685, 2644, 1, 10);
i will explain this. the 2330 is the X coord en the 3685 is the Y coord typ in game ::mypos to see you pos and to place the thieving stall. the 2644 is the object ID change it into the thieving stall ID. the 1 is for the direction. change to 0 if u want to turn it. the 10 is for the sort of the object mostly it will be 10.

to remove one, look into ur client.java on the same place as in the thing before. try to find the ID of the thieving stall that is placed, if u can’t find it do ctrl+f and then search for deletethatObject. then u find something like this.

       deletethatobject(2849, 3343);

then u find something like this. the 2849 is for the X coord and the 3343 is for the Y coord. change it to the place u want to get it.

then to change the loot go into client.java and search for the ID of the thieving stall and do ctrl+f and search for if(objectID == ####//thieving stall ID then there will stand something like addItem(995, 100000) or something change the 100000 to another number to choose the number of coins.
well that’s it hope it helped.

Read full topic
